titleStmt.title: Despatch from Francisco Joaquim Ferra do Amaral to United States Vice Consul, November 18, 1884

bibl.title: Despatch from Francisco Joaquim Ferra do Amaral to United States Vice Consul
Despatches from United States Consuls in St Paul Loanda

div1.p: I received your despatch of the 17th ult in which you not only enclosed the guarantees that the American Mission wishes to re-establish itself in Bailundo, but even an account of the effects and their value lost by the mission, which are supposed to be in possession of the Sobba who is held to be responsible for them. No one saw with greater regret than myself, that the Sobba of Bailudo could commit the same violence to the American Missionaries as he has at since committed on the Portuguese merchants and which certainly, neither you Sir, nor the Mission can think that such violences could have been ordered authorised or even insinuated either by me or any other Portuguese with the least investiture of authority. Of this
